plan(1,init, sentence(true,move(print,"Controller init ..."),'','' ))
plan(2,init, sentence(true,move( switchplan(work) ),'','' ))
plan(1,work, sentence(true,move(print,"Working ..."),'','' ))
plan(2,work, sentence(true,receiveMsg(''),'','' ))
plan(3,work, sentence(true,printCurrentMessage(''),'','' ))
plan(4,work, sentence(true,msgswitch(polar, p( 80,2) , raise( stopRobot , stopRobot )')),'','' ))
plan(5,work, sentence(true,move(resumeplan),'','' ))
